website_summaries.verdict: A botanical-based cleanser that will soften and tone skin. The first step toward a beautiful complexion.
pros: Contains herbal ingredients like St. John’s wort, sweet almond oil, marshmallow, and linden
Very soothing, so it's excellent for dry and sensitive skin
Creamy consistency doesn’t strip the skin
Does a good job getting makeup off
cons: It’s not so great at removing waterproof mascara or long-wearing makeup

customer_reviews.title: Most important beauty find of 2019
customer_reviews.text: I am in awe of this cleansing milk. I was introduced to the Clarins line from my mum and was actually using the cleansing milk with gentian before switching to the correct type of cleanser with alpine herbs. DO your research about how to use this product. Apply to your hands, rub on your face in circular motions and suction with hands 5-7 times. My first wash with this cleanser I was overwhelmed by the scent but then looked at the ingredient list and realized how botanical it is. It's been about 2 months of use and my skin is noticeably softer with more bounce. Do yourself a favour and invest in this while you can.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F

customer_reviews.title: Maple Prime is a greedy seller
customer_reviews.text: Maple Prime is selling the 6.7oz bottle for more than the 13.9 oz bottle. Do yourself a favor and search for the cheaper value before you get suckered into giving them money.
customer_reviews.author: heyrey

customer_reviews.title: Gently washes away dirt and make up
customer_reviews.text: Gentle cleansing milk. I’ve been using this for 25 years. Wonderful way to get make up and outer layer of dirt off before exfoliating or doing more thorough cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Blalock

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser around
customer_reviews.text: Best cleanser around. Non-oily or greasy. Gently removes face and eye makeup. Apply it and remove it with a facecloth wrung out with warm water. Follow with Clarins dry to normal toning lotion. (Yellow bottle). Tried several toning lotions, before using this one. None can compare.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kiraly

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle and effective cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This product is gentle but takes off all makeup and cleans you pores.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lamick

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: Makes my skin so soft. I can't find anything else that works so well
customer_reviews.author: gretchen

customer_reviews.title: It's my daily skin care regimen...
customer_reviews.text: Been using Clarins Cleansing Milk and Toning Lotion for over ten years. I love the results (and get lots of compliments about how great my skin looks!).
customer_reviews.author: Seafoam 58

customer_reviews.title: Love how smooth
customer_reviews.text: Been using Clarins for years and it always amazes me. Love how smooth, clear and how my skin glows. This eases my face with such refreshment. Thank you so much! Customer FOREVER!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Mary

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't bother my sensitive skin but I also didn't see much benefit.
customer_reviews.author: N7jamm

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this cleansing milk as I have very dry skin year round. It cleanses well and does not dry my skin as some milk cleansers tend to.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, gently removes makeup without irritation, good light smell, big value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will definetely recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. Gets rid of my make up at night and it feels nice on my skin. And cheaper than buying Armani milk cleanser at Saks which is excellng but way to expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jany Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Love love and love
customer_reviews.text: I been using this for 20 yrs. Love love and love!
customer_reviews.author: Edmeia D'Brito

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It is usefull even to clean my eyes which a few cleansings do both: face and eyes!...I will use it again!. You can trust in it.
customer_reviews.author: AS.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I recently started using the whole line of Clarins face products. This does a wonderful job of cleansing and leaving skin feeling soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It cleanses and moisturizes at the same time leaving my skin feel super soft.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Miracle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cleanser for about 15 years on and off. I must say it is top notch. Leaves your skin clean and moisturized. Highly recommend it for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Haydee Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Do not lather a lot but good for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: The Best 24 hour results!
customer_reviews.text: You actually see results in 24 hours. No joke! I hope all always be able to afford the products from this line!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. My skin felt so soft. Will be trying more Clarins products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat these prices
customer_reviews.text: I've used Clarins products on and off for years. I was searching for better value than the high street prices and I found it here. The product arrived in the old style bottles, but the content is the same as I'd get from a high street. Delivery was not the fastest, but within the time frame specified by the Amazon retailer I purchased it from.
customer_reviews.author: YogicBiker

customer_reviews.title: Legitimate product and it works well enough!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product off Amazon and one from Sephora at the same time to compare packaging, smell, quality, etc and I was very pleased to find out that every thing is exactly the same. Even the batch number was the same, so I am confident that this is an authentic product and am very pleased. As far as the product itself, if you don't like scents this cleanser is not for you. The scent isn't overpowering, but its definitely there. I use this as a second cleanse and like it, especially for the Amazon price. Not sure I would pay the original retail price for it, though.
customer_reviews.author: O Escobar

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I have sensitive skin and my face felt awful once we started turning on the heat and I remembered using this about 30 years ago and thought I'd try it out again. This feels refreshing on your face, is moisturizing and has a pleasant scent. I think that I'll keep using it now that I'm out of school and can afford it!
customer_reviews.author: immajeanius

customer_reviews.title: NOT CLARINS PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Clarins for a long time ... and THIS PRODUCT ... is NOT CLARINS. Not even the same smell as I adore. What a scam and bottle different ... BEWARE FOLKS! getting refund!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Timely Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I love Clarins products!! This seller had a great price. Would definitely use the seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Discover this jewel of a cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I received this in a gift sample pack that came with a purchase of Clarins serum. It is gentle and non drying for mature (ahem) skin, applies smoothly- and I especially appreciate rinsing easily with a damp wash cloth.
customer_reviews.author: betsy t

customer_reviews.title: Great for your skin and spirit
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this wonderful product when I agreed to try the line at Nordstrom. The small bottle has lasted over six months and has a delightful fragrance. My impression of the company is very high - from the quality of the products to the ladies who artistically apply them. And this is one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: PF Moore

customer_reviews.title: Loving this cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleanser - it feels so nice on my skin!
customer_reviews.author: kata

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best facial cleanser I have used. Does not cause any break outs which is amazing for me.
customer_reviews.author: cristine k. stanwyck

customer_reviews.title: Super product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cleanser for more than 30 years. Love ths product. It leaves my skin feeling clean and soft and smooth. Also love the Amazon price!
customer_reviews.author: A. Noni MouseTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I like how it feels and cleanses well. I generally use organic products but find it works well for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C Soon

customer_reviews.title: So clean and fresh !
customer_reviews.text: This is a great facial wash from Clarins. Buy it...you will love it. It is made with alpine herbs and leaves your skin fresh and soft. Works great for normal and sensitive skin !!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning Milk
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best. It treats your skin like a baby. The extra cost of the product is worth it. The facial skin is very important so pays to take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Benfelix

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife says it is wonderful. The price is right too!
customer_reviews.author: Jay B

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Long time customer of this gentle product. Not greasy, leaves the face feeling clean.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product, no harsh additives and has been around ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product, no harsh additives and has been around for many years. Cleans skin well and removes eye showdow and eye liner, non irritating to area around eyes. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Hockens

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for 10 years now. I have dry skin and this is like my own personal spa treatment.
customer_reviews.author: KLS

customer_reviews.title: Best Cleanser EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and get's ALL make-up off even mascara! Leaves your skin clean and soft! Won't use anything else and it is all natural!
customer_reviews.author: J. McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Best CleanserEver!
customer_reviews.text: Best CleanserEver!!!!!!!!! I have dry skin & this cleanser takes off all of my makeup but keeps my skin soft.
customer_reviews.author: Pammy

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT remove makeup!
customer_reviews.text: I used the Clarins toner after using the cleansing milk and my cotton pad was full of makeup that the cleanser did not take off! I don't know what it is cleaning but it definitely was not makeup.
customer_reviews.author: I heart my cats

customer_reviews.title: Product is ok for price
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be good, but not great ! Would I buy again at that price, perhaps not. I do get frustrated with these manufacturers of skin care products though. As soon as I find something I really love, generally a cleansing oil (not lotion) they discontinue them ! What's the point of that, if you already have happy, satisfied customers ?? Pet peeve for sure :-(
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

product_meta.title: Cleansing Milk - Normal to Dry Skin by Clarins for Unisex - 6.7 oz Cleansing Milk
product_meta.description: Size:6.7 ozA botanical-based, balancing lotion-textured cleanser. It gently lifts make-up and impurities enhancing a clear, pure complexion, moisturizes and neutralizes the drying effects of hard water. It is designed for dry-to-normal skin types. This daily-use cleanser leaves skin feeling fresh and comfortable. It naturally sets the stage for a healthy, beautiful complexion.
feature_bullets: Soothing cream cleanser lifts away make-up and impurities with a gentle touch
Maintains your skin's balance during cleansing
Gently smoothing away makeup and impurities
Naturally sets the stage for a healthy, beautiful complexion
